scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix Backend install && npm --prefix Frontend install
scripts.dev:backend:memory: cross-env USE_MEMORY_DB=true npm --prefix Backend run dev
scripts.dev:fast: cross-env USE_MEMORY_DB=true concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "npm:dev:backend" "npm --prefix Frontend run start"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend
scripts.demo:seed:memory: cross-env USE_MEMORY_DB=true npm --prefix Backend run db:bootstrap
scripts.demo:backend:memory: cross-env USE_MEMORY_DB=true npm --prefix Backend run dev
scripts.demo: npm run demo:seed:memory && npm run demo:start:memory
